name: Robot Fixer
description:
In this very small game your job is to fix 3 broken robots.

It is kind of a simple 3D remake of the Unity 2D tutorial: Ruby's Adventure.

Animations: Mixamo

3D models, textures & audio: Unity Technologies

Requirements
  • Windows 64 bit
  • Mouse
  • Vulkan support
Controls Control nameActionMouse left click
Movement when ground clicked.
Throw cog when robot clicked.
EscExit game
